00020 
00021 #ifndef CLPP_DETAIL_VALUES_CORRECTION_HPP
00022 #define CLPP_DETAIL_VALUES_CORRECTION_HPP
00023 
00024 #include "common_checker.hpp"
00025 #include "../parameter.hpp"
00026 #include "../parameter_parts_extractor.hpp"
00027 
00030 namespace clpp {
00031 
00034 namespace detail {
00035 
00036 typedef common_checker< parameters, parameter_parts_extractor, std::string > checker;
00037 
00044 class parameters_values_checker : public checker {
00045 public:
00046     parameters_values_checker( const parameters&                    registered_parameters
00047                                , const parameter_parts_extractor&   extractor
00048                                , const std::string&                 name_value_separator ) :
00049             checker( registered_parameters, extractor, name_value_separator ) {}
00050 public:
00051     void check( const str_storage& inputed_parameters ) const {
00052         BOOST_FOREACH ( const std::string& inputed_parameter, inputed_parameters ) {
00053             const std::string name  = extractor.extract_name_from( inputed_parameter );
00054             if ( this_is_parameter_with_value( inputed_parameter ) ) {
00055                 check_parameter_with_value( name, inputed_parameter );
00056             } else {
00057                 check_parameter_without_value( name );
00058             }
00059         } 
00060     }
00061 private:
00062     bool this_is_parameter_with_value( const std::string& inputed_parameter ) const {
00063         return boost::contains( inputed_parameter, name_value_separator );
00064     }
00065 private:
00066     void check_parameter_with_value( const std::string& name, const std::string& inputed_parameter ) const {
00067         parameter_const_it it = std::find( registered_parameters.begin()
00068                                            , registered_parameters.end()
00069                                            , name );
00070         if ( registered_parameters.end() != it ) {
00071             const std::string value = extractor.extract_value_from( inputed_parameter );
00072             if ( !it->func_without_arg.empty() ) {
00073                 notify_about_parameter_with_unexpected_value( name, value );
00074             } else if ( value.empty() ) {
00075                 notify_about_parameter_with_missing_value( name );
00076             }
00077         } else {} 
00078     }
00079     
00080     void notify_about_parameter_with_unexpected_value( const std::string& name
00081                                                        , const std::string& value ) const {
00082         const std::string what_happened = lib_prefix() 
00083                                           + "Parameter '" + name + "' inputed with value '" + value + "', "
00084                                           + "but registered without value!";
00085         throw std::logic_error( what_happened );
00086     }
00087     
00088     void notify_about_parameter_with_missing_value( const std::string& name ) const {
00089         const std::string what_happened = lib_prefix() + "Parameter '" + name 
00090                                           + "' registered with value, but value is missing!";
00091         throw std::logic_error( what_happened );
00092     }
00093 private:
00094     void check_parameter_without_value( const std::string& name ) const {
00095         parameter_const_it it = std::find( registered_parameters.begin()
00096                                            , registered_parameters.end()
00097                                            , name );
00098         if ( registered_parameters.end() != it ) {
00099             if ( it->func_without_arg.empty() ) {
00100                 notify_about_parameter_with_missing_value( name );
00101             } else {}
00102         } else{}
00103     }
00104 };
00105 
00106 } // namespace detail
00107 } // namespace clpp
00108 
00109 #endif // CLPP_DETAIL_VALUES_CORRECTION_HPP
